main.title: Coding everywhere
main.body:
Hello, I'm Felipe Gibran.
This is my space that I share to everyone. Be my guest.

about_me.title: Who I am
about_me.body: I'm fullstack web software engineer with 5+ years of experience. I've been working with several technologies that ensured me the ability to solve problems and develop many types of application. My responsibility is to show the best solution for clients. As a result, they will have a top quality application with lower operating and maintenance costs.

feature.title: What I can bring for your application

items.name: technology
items.title: Ultimate Technology Tools
items.description: Your application will be up to date with the best technologies and services of present day.

items.name: code
items.title: Clean & Structured code
items.description: Good codes are better for maintenance and third-parties implementations.

items.name: automation
items.title: Automation and Customization
items.description: The sky is the limit. Determine how automatic and customizable your application is, based on your budget.

items.name: security
items.title: Security
items.description: Safety above all. All security standards will be applied for your application.

items.name: responsiveness
items.title: Responsiveness
items.description: 80% of users prefer to browse web on smartphones rather than computers.

items.name: ux
items.title: Highest User Experience (UX)
items.description: The best experience that users can ever have. Engaged users means low rejection rate.

items.name: fastness
items.title: Fastness
items.description: Time is money. Good performance is also important to keep users.

items.name: seo
items.title: SEO patterns
items.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) makes your application easier to be found by new users.

items.name: ndapp
items.title: NDapp
items.description:
Get news, information, and data on all of the latest decentralized applications build using the Neo blockchain.

I worked as: Desenvolvedor Fullstack

Year: 2021

items.name: wow
items.title: WOW Talent
items.description:
Where talents grow and appear. Press Play and meet wow Ambassadors. WOW, even though they are young, each one of them has been treading their own path of professional success, with experiences and achievements that are a reference for the Talents who are starting the same journey. Meet all our ambassadors. Be part of it!

I worked as: Fullstack Developer

Year: 2021

items.name: illsim
items.title: Illness Simulator
items.description:
Welcome to Illsim! This is a college project developed in 2017 that studies the behavior of a virus spreading around a population. This study is to explore the best vaccination strategies as the virus spreads.
